Posts.Content: njdall wrote: I got my biopsy results the other day. It's ILC. Invasive lobular carcinoma. I'm trying to figure out the path report and wrap my head around this. Im 52 years old and have a 19 year old and a 16 year old. I'm trying to figure out how and when to tell them. Waiting to have MRI and see where things really are at. Size us 1.4cm so I hear that's small. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed Thursday njdall annika12

Posts.Content: Jul 28, 2013 03:12PM njdall wrote: Thanks everyone and sorry I have not been on here.  My news just keeps getting worse.  My tumor was small bit it's n 6 lymph nodes making my stage a 3A!!  Not what I was expecting at all. So we've seen the oncologist and I will have chemo every 3 weeks for 6 months and then radiation.  My main concern right now is the swelling under my arm where they took the lymph nodes out.  If it's not better by tomorrow I'll go in and have them look at it.  I had the drains out last week.  I'm 10 days out from surgery.  Then I need to get a Pet scan and a port put in.  Thanks for listening!!
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed Thursday njdall annika12
